monster.name: Abyssal Chicken
senses: visió a cegues 30ft. (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Bad Flier
entries: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Suave Defense
entries: While Amrik is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Amrik makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)
entries: Amrik hurls a smoke bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact, creating a cloud of black smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The area within the cloud is heavily obscured. A strong wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise remains until the end of Amrik's next turn.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zariel attacks twice with her flail and once with Matalotok. She can substitute Horrid Touch for Matalotok.

items.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany perforant plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc.

items.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning, or 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) de dany contundent if used with two hands, plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc. In addition, the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred to each creature within 30 feet of it.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

monster.name: Arkhan the Cruel
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (can see invisible creatures out to the same range)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Arkhan's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). He can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Hate
entries: While Arkhan isn't {@condition incapacitated}, he and all fiends and undead within 30 feet of him deal 4 extra damage whenever they hit with a melee weapon attack (already factored into Arkhan's attacks). This extra damage is of the same type as the weapon's damage type.

trait.name: Hand of Vecna
entries: The Hand of Vecna has 8 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Arkhan can cast the following spells from the hand by expending the specified number of charges (spell save {@dc 18}): {@spell finger of death} (5 charges), {@spell sleep} (1 charge), {@spell slow} (2 charges), and {@spell teleport} (3 charges).

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Arkhan wields {@item Fane-Eater|bgdia} and wears a suit of {@item Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate|bgdia}. The armor gives Arkhan advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on him.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Arkhan makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Fane-Eater (Battleaxe)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 1d8 + 12}) de dany tallant, or 17 ({@damage 1d10 + 12}) de dany tallant when used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred. If the target is a creature and Arkhan rolls a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and Arkhan regains an amount of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, plus 4 piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred if the javelin was used to make a melee attack.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Bel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}). Bel pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to Bel that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw, unless Bel is {@condition incapacitated}. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Bel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Bel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Bel's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bel makes three attacks: two with his greatsword and one with his tail.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany tallant plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a flammable object that is not being held or worn, it catches fire.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Bola de Foc
entries: Bel casts fireball.

legendary.name: Tactical Edge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Roll a {@dice d6} for Bel. The number rolled on the die is subtracted from the next attack roll made against Bel or an ally of his choice within the next minute.

legendary.name: Summon Ice Devil (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Bel magically summons an ice devil with an ice spear (as described in the ice devil's entry in the Monster Manual). The ice devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Bel, acts as Bel's ally, and can summon other devils if it has such power. The ice devil remains until Bel dies or until he dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Terror
entries: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition are immune to this trait.

trait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, range 120 ft., una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de radiant, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per cada nivell per sobre d'1.

trait.name: Adhesive
entries: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 10}).

trait.name: Death Scream
entries: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Healer
entries: Burney has the benefits of the {@feat healer} feat as well as proficiency with both the {@item healer's kit|phb} and the {@item herbalism kit|phb}.

items.name: Bahamut's Blessings
entries: Burney has received several blessings in her service to Bahamut:

items: Unless Burney decided otherwise, once any creature less powerful than a deity has taken three steps from her, they can no longer remember her or having interacted with her specifically.

Burney is under the effect of a permanent {@spell mind blank} spell, and cannot be detected by magical or mundane means unless she wishes it. In exchange for this blessing, Burney can take no direct action against the denizens of the Nine Hells, though she can certainly enlist the help of those who can.

Burney always knows the location of the Wandering Emporium and can transport herself there as though by a {@spell word of recall} spell. This explains why Burney simply seems to appear amid the fully deployed marketplace each morning it is active to provide service and tell stories.
Once each day, when Burney so desires, she can instantly transport herself to the court of Bahamut via a powerful blessing akin to the {@spell plane shift} spell.

action.name: Silvered Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hellfire Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent, or 5 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany contundent if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Crokek'toeck can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Crokek'toeck has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Crokek'toeck's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Secure Memory
entries: Crokek'toeck is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Crokek'toeck's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}44 ({@damage 10d6 + 9}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Disgorge Allies {@recharge}
entries: Crokek'toeck opens its mouth and disgorges {@dice 1d4} {@creature barlgura||barlguras}, {@dice 3d6} {@creature gnoll||gnolls} led by 1 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu}, {@dice 6d6} {@creature dretch||dretches}, or {@dice 1d3} {@creature vrock||vrocks}. Each creature it disgorges appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Crokek'toeck's mouth, or the next closest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Aura of Murder
entries: As long as the death's head is not {@condition incapacitated}, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death's head has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The death's head uses Stunning Gaze and makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Stunning Gaze
entries: The death's head targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Unstoppable (3/Day)
entries: The death's head reduces the damage it takes from an attack to 0.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, range 120 ft., una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany de força.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 dany contundent.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (1st-Level Spell; 2/Day)
entries: When Thalamra is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of her that she can see, the creature that damaged her is engulfed in hellish flames and must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, abast 10 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Fiendish Flesh Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 100 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. If the golem's creator is within 60 feet of the berserk golem, the creator can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 100 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The fist of Bane has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Withering Gaze
entries: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitution amb {@dc 12} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is also {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Sword Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The hollyphant's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). It pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

1e: {@spell shapechange} (into a golden-furred {@creature mammoth} with feathered wings and a flying speed of 120 ft.)

trait.name: Aura of Invulnerability
entries: An {@condition invisible} aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Tusks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Trumpet (3/Day)
entries: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

action.name: Trumpet of Blasting
entries: Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de tro and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Trumpet of Sparkles
entries: Creatures in the cone must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany de radiant on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

trait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Voice of Command
entries: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Kostchtchie's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}). He pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Kostchtchie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Kostchtchie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Kostchtchie makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d6 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) de dany contundent, or 21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) de dany contundent when used with two hands, and the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred to each creature within 30 feet of it.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Kostchtchie makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: Kostchtchie moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Curse (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Kostchtchie curses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The cursed creature gains vulnerability to all damage dealt by Kostchtchie until the end of Kostchtchie's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Krull is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Krull can hold his breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Inescapable Destruction
entries: Necrotic damage dealt by Krull's spells ignores resistance to necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: +1 Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany contundent plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: Krull withdraws into his shell. Until he emerges as a bonus action, he has a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in his shell, Krull is {@condition prone}, his speed is 0 and can't increase, he has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, he can't take reactions, and the only action he can take is to emerge from his shell.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Mahadi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 9} a impactar with spell attacks). He pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Mahadi can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Mahadi's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Mahadi makes four claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant, and the target is cursed if it's a creature. The curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

action.name: Summon Erinyes (1/Day)
entries: Mahadi summons Ilzabet, an erinyes bound to him by an infernal contract. The erinyes appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other devils. The erinyes remains for 10 minutes or until Mahadi dismisses it as an action. If the erinyes dies, Mahadi loses this action option.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The master of souls is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Grave Magic
entries: When the master of souls cast a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage type to necrotic.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The master of souls attacks twice with its flail.

action.name: Silvered Skull Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the master of souls' next turn.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, range 120 ft., una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the master of souls' next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the master of souls for the same duration.

action.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitution amb {@dc 14} o be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the master of souls' next turn. If the master of souls casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} per cada nivell per sobre d'1.

action.name: Raig d'Incendi (2nd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, range 120 ft., un objectiu per ray (3 rays if a 2nd-level spell slot is used, 4 rays if a 3rd-level spell slot is used). {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc per ray.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub

headerEntries: Thurstwell is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Thurstwell has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
entries: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de radiant, gaining no benefit from cover.

trait.name: Goring Rush
entries: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

trait.name: Rage (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits:
He has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
He deals an extra 3 damage when he hits a target with a melee weapon attack.
He has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Torogar wears {@item gauntlets of flaming fury|bgdia} and a {@item belt of fire giant strength}. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a {@item soul coin|bgdia}.

action.name: Multi-atac
